original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 15.90. Saraṇaduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: sa raṇa duka sani dassana ttika

original: Araṇaṁ anidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇam anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā sabbattha eka

original: Saraṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo
analyzed: saraṇam a nidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā araṇam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca araṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam a nidassana appaṭigham ca araṇam a nidassana appaṭigham ca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi aññamaññe ekam pe vipāke ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetu-naārammaṇa
analyzed: na hetuna ārammaṇa

original: Araṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na hetu paccayā

original: Saraṇaṁ anidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇam anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati na ārammaṇa paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… nakamme ekaṁ …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… navippayutte ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetuyāḥ eka na ārammaṇe tīṇi pe na kamme ekam pe na āhāre na indriye na jhāne na magge ekam pe na vippayutte ekam pe no vigate tīṇi

original: (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: saraṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na anidassana appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: araṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na anidassana appaṭighassa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ

original: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā dve adhipatiyā dve sahajāte nissaye tīṇi pacchājāte kamme dve vipāke ekaḥ āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve pe avigate tīṇi

original: Saraṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo nasaraṇassa naanidassanaappaṭighassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: saraṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ na saraṇassa na anidassana appaṭighassa dhammassa sahajāta paccayena paccayaḥ pacchājāta paccayena paccayaḥ kamma paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta

original: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… noavigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetuyā tīṇi na ārammaṇe tīṇi pe no avigate tīṇi

original: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvāraṁ, evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: yathā kusala attike pañhāvāraḥ evam
